location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Newnham, Secretary to the Government, Marine Department, Bombay to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Resident that the four artificers (two carpenters and two ironsmiths), first mentioned in the Secretary's communication dated 15 October 1819, will proceed to Bushire on board the Francis Warden. It is noted they have been provided with tools, provisions and advance pay; these are further detailed within the letter. Further information is provided on how their pay and allowances will be issued once the period of their advance pay expires.
